author: Deborah B
title: High Quality Hotel with ideal central location
text:
We stayed here on a Tesco Clubcard deal between Christmas & New Year. It is minutes away from Tower Hill tube station and literally next to Tower Bridge. The hotel is modern and professional. Our room was clean and bright but the best part was the shower glass. It has an opaque or clear flick switch. I played with it LOTS!!!
We had food & drinks in the bar which were expensive so maybe pop next door to Wetherspoons?!!
Breakfast was included and was nice. Nothing special though.
